#id=1
#text=I have the luxury of having a hairdresser for a mother , but if you were interested in getting a haircut you are in luck as it is quite a simple process !
#id=2
#text=If you have short hair like me feel free to frequent a local chain establishment as they do just as good of a job as the luxury salons .
#id=3
#text=A place like Cost Cutter or Supercuts will work just fine .
#id=4
#text=Generally you can show up without any announcement and will only have to wait for a short period of time .
#id=5
#text=Make sure to sign in when you get there .
#id=6
#text=Once you are called up sit in the chair and explain the details of your haircut to your hair dresser .
#id=7
#text=Sometimes it helps if you bring a picture along with you .
#id=8
#text=The haircut should be relatively quick if you have short hair , and then all you need to do is pay .
#id=9
#text=It is suggested that you tip the hair dresser for your haircut .
#text=After this is done make sure to go to a public setting or over a friends house to see if they notice the new do !
